contest-event.event-date:
Feb. 21, 1988 D Stroud Brass Band Festival (Fourth Section)
Stroud Brass Band Festival (Fourth Section) 40 Test Piece Contest Stroud Brass Band Festival stroud-brass-band-festival-fourth-section
Entertainments Contest
Stroud Subscription Rooms, Stroud, Gloucestershire, England, UK Prizes - 1st £100 and cup, 2nd £65 and cup, 3rd £40 and cup, 4th £25 and cup, 5th £15 and cup, 6th £10 and cup. Best euphonium - Nailsworth. Best cornet and percussion - Weston super Mare. 10 bands competed.
Oct. 25, 2014, 10:24 a.m. Feb. 7, 2017, 7:54 a.m.
1 Weston Brass Dave Fisher
2 Malvern Hills District Brass Band Robin Morgan
3 Nailsworth T. G. Picken
4 Pillowell Silver Band Clive Lewis
5 Cricklade Town P. R. Hewer
6 Highworth Silver Raymond Bull
Unknown Result Cheltenham Silver R. Harrison
Unknown Result Chalgrove Band Anthony Spicer

Unknown Result Winchcombe Concert Brass J. Walters
Withdrawn Frampton on Severn Silver Band Unknown
